title: How Can I Send a Text Message to  Several Recipients?
answer:
To send a message to several recipients, do as follows:
1. Select Option by pressing the left soft key, and then select Done.
2. Select Send to many > Edit recipients > Option > Edit.
3. Enter a phone number directly, and then select Ok; or, select Search to add a phone number from the phonebook, and then select Select.
4. Repeat step 3 to add other phone numbers (a maximum of 20 numbers can be added).
Finally, return to the Send to many screen, and then select Send now to send the text message.
